paper_abstract: The time complexity analysis of ant colony optimization (ACO) is one of the open problems in ACO research. There has been little proposed work on this topic recently. In the present paper, two ACO algorithms (ACO I and ACO 11) for linear functions with Boolean input are indicated, and their time complexity is estimated based on drift analysis which is a mathematical tool for analyzing evolutionary algorithms. It is proved that the algorithm ACO 11 can find the optimal solution with a polynomial time complexity. It is a preliminary work about estimating the time complexity of ACO, which should be improved in the future study.
paper_title: A time complexity analysis of ACO for linear functions
